document_data.mainbody:
The Bonaku Boarding House was a boarding house in the Tu Lung city of Balanzia around the .
This boarding house was located in the eastern reaches of Balanzia, down the street from the citys market and the observatory of Minkra the Sage.
Around , the boarding house was one of many buildings that were damaged in Balanzia as the city fell at the hands of the Shou Lung invasion of Tu Lung.The Bonaku Boarding House is not explicitly stated in text to have been damage in the incident that destroyed the city. However, on the "before-and-after" maps of Balanzia in Kara-Tur The Eastern Realms the building is at least partially erased on the "after" version. Therefore, it can be inferred that it was likely damaged.
